channel.title: Rum on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Rum on Need a drink?

item.title: Between the sheets
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml brandy
  • 30 ml rum
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Cube libre
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 90 ml cola
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

  1. Build in highball glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with a lime wedge.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 10 ml sugar syrup
  • lime zest
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients including lime zest.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a lime slice.

item.title: Dark 'n' stormy
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 90 ml ginger beer
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

  1. Build in highball glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with a lime wedge.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Shake with ice.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass
  3. Garnish with lime slice.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

  1. Crush ice in clean tea towel.
  2. Lightly clap mint.
  3. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass.
  4. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water.
  5. Garnish with a mint sprig.

item.title: Piña colada
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml rum
  • 30 ml coconut milk
  • 90 ml pineapple juice
  • (garnish) pineapple slice
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Build in cocktail glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.
